{"id":1482366597,"question_id":3329,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1734554682,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"154 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1482366597/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Length of the Longest Common Prefix","memory":"135.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int longestCommonPrefix(vector<int>& arr1, vector<int>& arr2) {\n        unordered_set<int> arr1Prefixes;\n        for(auto num:arr1) {\n            while(!arr1Prefixes.count(num) && num>0) {\n                arr1Prefixes.insert(num);\n                num /=10;\n            }\n        };\n        int ret = 0;\n        for(auto num:arr2) {\n            while(!arr1Prefixes.count(num) && num>0) {\n                num /=10;\n            }\n            if(num>0)\n                ret = max(ret, (int)to_string(num).length());\n        };\n        return ret;\n    }\n\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-length-of-the-longest-common-prefix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
